alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Nacogdoches; Panola; Rusk; Shelby; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Marion, western Harrison, western Panola, Rusk, northeastern Nacogdoches, northwestern Shelby, southeastern Upshur and Gregg Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Minden, or 16 miles southeast of Henderson, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Longview, Nacogdoches, Henderson, Kilgore, Carthage, White Oak, Gladewater, Hallsville, Overton, Tatum, Timpson, New London, Garrison, Clarksville City, Beckville, East Mountain, Pinehill, Trawick, Liberty City and Harleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Nacogdoches; Panola; Rusk; Shelby; Upshur
